pages.name: Dome of Suppression
pages.text: Use a $(l:neovitae:rituals/ritual_diviner)Ritual Diviner$(/l) for easier construction.

This ritual creates a hemispherical dome that temporarily removes all fluid source blocks within its range. The fluids are suppressed - not destroyed - and will return when the ritual is deactivated. Useful for underwater construction, draining lava lakes, or creating air pockets in flooded areas.
